nodes.text: The Mon Calamari legislative chamber, known as the Mon Cala prison when used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems, was a chamber in Mon Cala city where representatives and government officials of the Mon Cala monarchy convened. During the Clone Wars, Chieftain Nossor Ri and the Quarren announced their succession in the chamber to the Mon Calamari and the Galactic Republic. After the Battle of Mon Cala erupted and the Separatists gained control of the city, the war-torn chamber was used as a prison.
